scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet && concurrently -k "npm run start:ui" "ADMIN_PORT=10001 npm run start:agent"
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet && concurrently "npm run start:ui" "ADMIN_PORT=10001 npm run start:agent" "DISABLE_DEEP_LINK=true ADMIN_PORT=10002 npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:ui: concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet" "npm run start -w we"
scripts.start:agent: concurrently "npm run tauri:dev" "holochain-playground ws://localhost:${ADMIN_PORT}" "npm run publish:applets"
scripts.tauri:dev: RUST_LOG=info WASM_LOG=warn npm run tauri dev --release -- -- -- --profile ${ADMIN_PORT}
scripts.build:ui: npm run build:libs && npm run build -w we
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack ./workdir --recursive
scripts.prepare:lair: rimraf src-tauri/bins && mkdir src-tauri/bins && cp $(which lair-keystore) src-tauri/bins/lair-keystore-v0.2.3-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && chmod +w src-tauri/bins/lair-keystore-v0.2.3-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
